name: Molehill Manager
description:
Manage a molehill and lead your labour to greatness!

Made for Godot Wild Jam 45!

Game Details:

You have been elected as the foreman of the molehill! Direct your moles to dig up resources, upgrade their abilities, hire new moles, and strive to erect a diamond monument in your honor!

But watch out for your food supplies. The population grows with every passing day, and you will need to feed the moles every day or you will be ousted from the job!

Mouse and Keyboard Controls:

  • Spacebar = Open/Close build menu
    • (Can also be opened by double-clicking the home base)
  • WASD = Pan Camera
  • Left Click = Select Unit
  • Right Click = Send Unit
